title: Retrocon - Watch Face
summary: The ultimate 80s retro gamer watch face!
description: The retro digital watch face inspired by 80s consoles and games that still hold a special place in our hearts.Features:★ Wear 2.0 ready★ Very battery efficient★ Automatic 12/24 support based on device settings★ Date and month★ Ambient mode support★ Press and hold to choose your text color on digital time font★ Tap watch face to cycle game backgrounds★ Hearts in the game background show watch battery level★ Round and square watch supportThis Android Wear watch face does not have an icon. A minute or so after installation, it will appear in the Android Wear app and your paired Android wear watch.Have any questions or comments? Feel free to contact me: info@warpx.caThis app was inspired by the Nintendo NES, Famicom and SNES, other consoles and 8 bit gaming but I am not affiliated with Nintendo Co., Ltd.And a special thanks to Buch, Jetrel and DawnBringer from opengameart.org for some of the game graphics.
descriptionHTML:
The retro digital watch face inspired by 80s consoles and games that still hold a special place in our hearts.


Features:

★ Wear 2.0 ready
★ Very battery efficient
★ Automatic 12/24 support based on device settings
★ Date and month
★ Ambient mode support
★ Press and hold to choose your text color on digital time font
★ Tap watch face to cycle game backgrounds
★ Hearts in the game background show watch battery level
★ Round and square watch support


This Android Wear watch face does not have an icon. A minute or so after installation, it will appear in the Android Wear app and your paired Android wear watch.


Have any questions or comments? Feel free to contact me: info@warpx.ca

This app was inspired by the Nintendo NES, Famicom and SNES, other consoles and 8 bit gaming but I am not affiliated with Nintendo Co., Ltd.

And a special thanks to Buch, Jetrel and DawnBringer from opengameart.org for some of the game graphics.
comments: Thank you for the free app sale!
Concept is great, but the time text is out of place on my Asus ZenWatch 2. Please fix.

Updated: The Dev team are awesome! Fixed the alignment issue as soon as I wrote to them. Well done guys thumbs up! Definely recommend them. ------- Old : Does not work with Sony Smartwatch 3 ( Square Dial )
Great concept but font does not line up on Moto 360 2nd gen. Dev was very quick to respond and is working on it
Throw back!! Super cool app...works great. Love looking at my watch and seeing a retro NES graphic :)
Text doesn't align with the graphics. Little customisation.
recentChanges: Added support for the Polar m600
Added a phone component for easier install on watch
Support for LG Watch Style added!
